All Packages  Class Hierarchy  Index

Interface com.metratech.sdk.base.MTMeter

public interface MTMeter

The MTMeter object controls the rest of the metering library. Each application using the library should have a MTMeter object that is used to generate MTMeterSession objects.

LOG_LEVEL_DEBUG

 

LOG_LEVEL_NONE

addConnection(MTMeterConnection)

Add Connection to the pool of available connections.

connections()

Get a list of connections in the pool.

Creates the named metered session.

Get the logging level.

Obtains the current logging stream.

Meter from an input stream.

Remove all connections from the pool.

Remove the named connection from the pool.

Set the logging level.

Terminates the SDK.

Initializes the SDK.

createSession

 
 public abstract MTMeterSession createSession(String name) throws MTException

Creates the named metered session. to hold property values that are used to describe a metered event.

 

Parameters:

service - The name of the service.

Returns:

the newly created MTMeterSession object.

Throws: MTException

if unsuccessful.
